404_MESSAGE: Looks like the page you're looking for was not found
YOU_NEED_TO_CLEAR_SPENDING: You need to clear {{amount}} of spending to reconcile this account.
YOU_NEED_TO_CLEAR_INCOME: You need to clear {{amount}} of income to reconcile this account.
RECONCILE_CLEARED_BALANCE_MATCHES: Your cleared balance matches your actual account balance.
DO_NOT_HAVE_ACCOUNT_MESSAGE: Don't have an account? Upgrade to unlock syncing. Free for 7 days!
OFFLINE_MODE_WARNING_EXPLANATION: You are in offline mode. Click the button below to sign in to ensure you do not lose data.
REMOVE_BUDGET_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to permanently delete "{{name}}"?
FREE_VERSION_EXPLANATION: You're currently using the free version. Your budgets are stored in the browser, and could be deleted if you clear the browser cache!
LOADING_SUBSCRIPTIONS_FAILED_EXPLANATION: Loading subscription information failed. It looks like you might not have an internet connection. No worries -- refresh the page later when you do.
TRIAL_CANCELLED_EXPLANATION: It looks like your trial was cancelled. Your last date of premium service will be {{date}}.
SUBSCRIPTION_CANCELLED_EXPLANATION: It looks like your subscription was cancelled. Your last date of premium service will be {{date}}.
SUBSCRIPTION_BILLING_EXPLANATION: Your subscription will be renewed on {{date}} for {{amount}} on your card ending in {{last4}}. Your subscription is billed every year.
CANCEL_SUBSCRIPTION_SERVICE_CONTINUATION: (Don't worry, by canceling you will continue to have premium service until {{date}}.)
NO_CARD_ON_ACCOUNT: It looks like you don't currently have a card on your account! Your subscription will end on {{date}} unless you add a card.
NO_SUBSCRIPTION: You don't currently have an active subscription.
YOU_MUST_ADD_A_PAYMENT_METHOD: You must add a payment method below before starting your subscription.
CARD_ON_ACCOUNT_EXPLANATION: Your card ({{brand}}) ending in {{last4}} is on your account.
PASSWORD_MINIMUM_LENGTH: Password must be at least 6 characters long
PROBLEM_RESETTING_PASSWORD: There was a problem resetting your password
PROBLEM_RESETTING_PASSWORD_SUBTEXT_2: Has it been more than 15 minutes since requesting the password reset link?
SIGNUP_TODAY_TITLE: Sign up today for Financier Premium. No credit card required.
NO_SYNCING_DATA_IN_BROWSER: No syncing, data stored in browser
CLEARING_BROWSER_CACHE_WILL_DELETE_BUDGE: Clearing your browser cache will delete budgets!
SYNCING_AND_BACKUPS_TO_CLOUD: Syncing and backups to the cloud
EMAIL_ADDRESS_ALREADY_REGISTERED: This email address is already registered
INTERNAL_ERROR: Internal error. Please try again later.
SIGNUP_FINE_PRINT: Your password is immediately encrypted with PBKDF2. We will never share your personal information. By signing up, you agree to our terms of service and privacy policy.
SIGNUP_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: You're all set! Login and your budgets will start syncing.
PROBLEM_VERIFYING_ACCOUNT: There was a problem verifying your account
VERIFY_QUESTION_2: Has it been more than 15 minutes since you signed up?
VERIFY_QUESTION_3: Have you already verified your account?
ACCOUNT_CONTAINS_TRANSACTIONS_MESSAGE: Please remove the {{totalTransactions}} transactions in this account before deleting it.
ACCOUNT_TYPE_HELP: On budget accounts affect your budget.\n\nOff budget accounts are used for tracking purposes (do not affect your budget).
OFF_BUDGET_ACCOUNT_MESSAGE: Off budget accounts do not affect your budget and are not required to use Financier. Only use off budget accounts if you want them reflected in reports and if you can take the time to keep them up to date.
REMOVE_CATEGORY_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to remove the category "{{category}}"? This action can affect historical budget data and should only be used if the category is completely unused.
REMOVE_RECONCILED_TRANSACTIONS_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to remove these {{length}} transactions? This includes {{reconciled}} reconciled transactions!
CHECK_EMAIL_FOR_MORE: Check your email for further instructions.
OUTFLOW_HELPER_MESSAGE: You don't have any transactions (outflows) for {{date}} in the category "{{outflowCategory}}".
CREATE_TRANSACTIONS_HELP: To create transactions, go to the accounts view and click add a transaction.
HANDLE_OVERSPENDING_Q: How do you want to handle overspending for this category?
SUBTRACT_FROM_NEXT_MONTH_NO_RIGHT_ARROW: Subtract it from the next month's "Available to Budget"
SUBTRACT_FROM_NEXT_MONTH_RIGHT_ARROW: Subtract it from the next month's category balance
YOUR_ACCOUNT_RECONCILED: Your account has been successfully reconciled.
WHAT_ACTUAL_BALANCE: What is your actual account balance?
SYNC_STATUS_HELP: The current synchronization status of your local data with the server.
CREATE_ACCOUNT_BEFORE_TRANSACTION: You need to create an account before creating a transaction!
NOT_CHARGED_UNTIL_END_MESSAGE: You won't be charged until your subscription is up.
NO_CHANGE_PAYEE_SPLIT_MESSAGE: This transfer is from a split transaction. To change the payee, change it within the split transaction this transfer originates from.
NO_CHANGE_PAYEE_SPLIT: Cannot change payee of split transaction transfer
NO_CHANGE_VALUE_SPLIT: Cannot change amount of split transaction transfer
NO_CHANGE_VALUE_SPLIT_MESSAGE: This transfer is from a split transaction. To change the value, modify the split transaction this transfer originates from.
NO_DELETE_SPLIT: Cannot delete transfer of split transaction
NO_DELETE_SPLIT_MESSAGE: This transfer is from a split transaction. To remove it, modify the split transaction this transfer originates from.
NO_SPLIT_TRANSFER: Split transaction cannot also be transfer
NO_SPLIT_TRANSFER_MESSAGE: The split transaction cannot also be a transfer. Either change the payee field to not be an account, or make the transaction category not a split.
SPLIT_NOT_EQUAL: Split transactions do not add up to transaction total
SPLIT_NOT_EQUAL_MESSAGE: Ensure that your split transaction inflow/outflows add up to the transaction's total, then try saving again.
USE_AVERAGE_3_MONTHS_BUDGET: Use average of last 3 months' budget
CLEAR_ALL_BUDGET_AMOUNTS: Clear all budget amounts for this month
SECURE_PAYMENT_PROCESSING: Your payment information is sent directly to our secure payment processor, Stripe.
REMOVE_LOCAL_BUDGETS_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure that you want to clear all local budget data? You're not currently logged in, and you will lose all changes since the last time you logged in and synced.
TOO_MANY_PASSWORD_RESET_ATTEMPTS: Too many password reset attempts. Try again in 15 minutes.
RESET_PROCEED_TO_LOGIN: You can now proceed to login with your new password.
